name: Flame Lash
description: Lash an enemy with flame, dealing 2323 Flame Damage.  If you strike an enemy that is immobilized or stunned, you set them Off Balance.  Targeting an Off Balance or immobilized enemy changes this ability into Power Lash, allowing you to lash an enemy at half cost to deal 2760 Flame Damage and healing you for 2760 Health.
effectLines: Targeting Off Balance or Immobilized enemies grants you a more powerful attack which deals increased damage, costs half as much, and heals you.
coefDescription: Lash an enemy with flame, dealing $1 Flame Damage.  If you strike an enemy that is immobilized or stunned, you set them Off Balance.  Targeting an Off Balance or immobilized enemy changes this ability into Power Lash, allowing you to lash an enemy at half cost to deal $2 Flame Damage and healing you for $3 Health.
rawDescription:
Lash an enemy with flame, dealing <<1>>.

If you strike an enemy that is immobilized or stunned, you set them Off Balance.

Targeting an Off Balance or immobilized enemy changes this ability into <<2>>, allowing you to lash an enemy at half cost to deal <<3>> and healing you for <<4>> Health.
